course_detail.title: ACCT  647 - Accounting
course_detail.academic_group: Lee Kong Chian Sch of Business
course_detail.description: This course provides students with a basic understanding of accounting as “the language of business”. It introduces students to the basic concepts and principles underlying the accounting process, culminating in analysing financial statements. In addition, coverage of costing, budget and planning provides students with tools to manage business operations.
